quotes.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.content: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.content: Love is not about possession. Love is about appreciation.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.content: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.content: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.content: Your self-worth is determined by you. You don't have to depend on someone telling you who you are.
quotes.author: Beyoncé

quotes.content: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!'
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.content: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.content: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And you are the guy who'll decide where to go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.content: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.content: To bring about change, you must not be afraid to take the first step. We will fail when we fail to try.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.content: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.content: Don't sit down and wait for the opportunities to come. Get up and make them.
quotes.author: Madam C.J. Walker

quotes.content: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.content: I am lucky that whatever fear I have inside me, my desire to win is always stronger.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.content: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.content: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.content: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.content: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.content: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.content: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.content: Real change, enduring change, happens one step at a time.
quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.content: All dreams are within reach. All you have to do is keep moving towards them.
quotes.author: Viola Davis

quotes.content: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.content: When you put love out in the world it travels, and it can touch people and reach people in ways that we never even expected.
quotes.author: Laverne Cox

quotes.content: Give light and people will find the way.
quotes.author: Ella Baker

quotes.content: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.content: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.content: If you risk nothing, then you risk everything.
quotes.author: Geena Davis

quotes.content: Definitions belong to the definers, not the defined.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.content: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.content: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.content: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.content: Love is like the wind, you can’t see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.content: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.content: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. That’s what I hope to give you forever.
quotes.author: Noah from The Notebook

quotes.content: I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.content: To be your friend was all I ever wanted; to be your lover was all I ever dreamed.
quotes.author: Valerie Lombardo

quotes.content: My wish is that you may be loved to the point of madness.
quotes.author: André Breton

quotes.content: A purpose of human life, no matter who is controlling it, is to love whoever is around to be loved.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.content: Romance is the glamour which turns the dust of everyday life into a golden haze.
quotes.author: Elinor Glyn

quotes.content: Love is always patient and kind. It is never jealous. Love is never boastful or conceited. It is never rude or selfish. It does not take offense and is not resentful. Love takes no pleasure in other people’s sins, but delights in the truth. It is always ready to excuse, to trust, to hope, and to endure whatever comes.
quotes.author: 1 Corinthians 13:4-7

quotes.content: Love is the strange bewilderment which overtakes one person on account of another person.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.content: One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: that word is love.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.content: Flatter me, and I may not believe you. Criticize me, and I may not like you. Ignore me, and I may not forgive you. Encourage me, and I will not forget you. Love me and I may be forced to love you.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.content: So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.content: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.content: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.content: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.content: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.content: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.content: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.content: Money and success don’t change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.content: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people’s thinking.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.content: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.content: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.content: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one’s destiny to do, and then do it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.content: In order to write about life first you must live it.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.content: The big lesson in life, baby, is never be scared of anyone or anything.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.content: The sun himself is weak when he first rises, and gathers strength and courage as the day gets on.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.content: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.content: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.content: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.content: Courage doesn’t always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, ‘I will try again tomorrow.’
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.content: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.content: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.content: Sometimes, when things are falling apart, they may actually be falling into place.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.content: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.author: Albus Dumbledore (J.K. Rowling)

quotes.content: The harder you fall, the higher you bounce.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.content: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.content: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.content: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.content: This too shall pass.
quotes.author: Persian Proverb
